item.description:
The Conspiracy Café at 45 Mt. Auburn St. in Harvard Sq. is now open EVERY Sunday from noon to 8:00 pm. It offers a unique setting for 9/11 Truth activists and those curious to learn more about current events through books, DVDs, film screenings and informal discussions, in a casual café environment. The Conspiracy Café offers a wide selection of books, DVDs, & other media. So whether your desires are social, intellectual or oriented toward activism, the Conspiracy Café has something for everyone. Hope to see you at the next Conspiracy Café! So what are you waiting for? Bring a friend, bring yourself, bring an open mind! Come check out what Conspiracy Café is all about!

Donations to help cover the cost of renting the Democracy Center are appreciated by the Boston 911 Truth organizers. That's the $5 cost we mention - please come anyway if you can't afford it!



Merrimack Valley 911 Truth has set up a "ride-sharing group" online at eRideShare.com. Our group nickname is "mv911t" and our password is "truth". Post if you are driving to one of our events and have extra seats - if you're looking for a ride to an event just logon and post that you're seeking a ride.

As always, donations to the driver for the ride-sharing are always appreciated to cover gas costs.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the crazed conspiracy nut!
item.name: Conspiracy Café - Cambridge
